readable.title: 207237775_fa0a15c6fe
readable.content: A man doing a back flip while another takes a picture . A person is taking a picture of another person doing a flip in midair in the grass . A young man takes a picture of his friend doing gymnastics in a field One man taking a photo of another man jumping in a field by a small tree . One person does a flip in the middle of the field while their friend takes a picture .
